numbered_ace_sentences: 1. There are four graphs.
2. In all four graphs, the majority of players in every league are players of color.
3. In every league, more than 60 percent of players are players of color.
4. In each league, there are managerial positions.
5. In the managerial positions of each league, no league has more than 50 percent coaches or managers of color.
6. I wonder why teams do not focus on racial diversity in coaching positions.
7. I wonder why leagues do not focus on racial diversity in coaching positions.
8. A coach should be evaluated by team performance.
9. A coach should not be evaluated by skin color.
10. I wonder why the percentage of managers of color varies drastically between leagues.
11. I wonder whether the diversity of managers of color depends on the sport.
12. This situation has little impact on my community.
13. Very few of my family friends focus on sports.
14. Very few of my friends focus on sports.
15. Very few of my family friends focus on the skin color of coaches or players.
16. Very few of my friends focus on the skin color of coaches or players.
17. There should be more awareness in smaller towns.
18. I live in a predominantly white state.
19. In my state, there is little forced racism.
20. In my state, there is little diversity on sports teams.
21. When I watch sports, I do not focus on who is white.
22. When I watch sports, I do not focus on who is a player of color.
23. When I watch sports, I focus on whether my team is winning.
24. When I watch sports, I focus on whether my team is losing.
25. The headline is: Racial inequality is at the top of many of our sports organizations.
